newsitem.title: ITALY: ITALY FUEL USE BY GENERATING SECTOR FALLS IN JULY.
newsitem.headline: ITALY FUEL USE BY GENERATING SECTOR FALLS IN JULY.

text.p: Consumption of fuel oil by Italy's power generating sector fell 10.3 percent in July year on year to 1.7 million tonnes, data from trade group Unione Petrolifera (UP) showed.
In January-July, consumption by the sector fell 12.9 percent to 11.7 million tonnes, UP said in a statement.

UP data showed that one percent sulphur fuel oil accounted for 1.4 million tonnes in July, a 9.1 percent rise on July last year, but in the January-July period posted a fall of 9.2 percent to 9.2 million tonnes.
In July, total consumption of oil products was down 2.3 percent from July last year to 7.9 million tonnes, mainly due to falling demand for fuel oil by the power generating sector, UP said.
In the first seven months of 1997, consumption of oil products fell 3.6 percent to 53.4 million tonnes from the same period last year, -- Milan newsroom +392 66129589
